document.full_text: behind a 24-point effort by lebron james, the miami heat took the first game of the n.b.a. finals over the dallas mavericks.
document.title: heat 92, mavericks 86: james leads heat over dallas in game 1
lines_and_colors: behind a 24-point effort by lebron james, the miami heat took the first game of the n.b.a. finals over the dallas mavericks.
